title: Self-learning is a craft
content: Self-learning is a craft； You must find a way to activate self-learning, or you have no future; Treat self-learning as a craft, honing it through persistent practice over time; You understand the differences between the stages of learning, practicing, applying, and creating, along with tailored strategies for each;

sentences.text: You must find a way to activate self-learning, or you have no future;
Treat self-learning as a craft, honing it through persistent practice over time;
You understand the differences between the stages of learning, practicing, applying, and creating, along with tailored strategies for each;
